com.xtructure.xutil.xml
Class XmlWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.xml.XmlWriter

public final class XmlWriter
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of convenience methods for translating an object to its xml representation.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
